title: Once I have stopped believing in something, how can I start again? - Quora

response.answer_text: Start talking to your Heavenly Father and Jesus, each day or night. Just like you would an old friend that you had an argument with and you really want to convince them to be your friend again, that you do love and like them. Give them time to notice and see you really mean it! You must mean it! They will open your heart door it will flow back again. We have to do our part and Christ will jump in with both feet. Just talk freely to God and Christ about anything-just start.

Why do you want to start believing in something you once stopped believing? If your primary concern is truth and not because a certain belief “can bring certain benefits”, then you shouldn’t worry about this kind of stuffs. Just follow where evidences lead your belief to and just follow it.
